about_the_game: Nezha is a character in Chinese mythology. He has powerful magic power. He is brave and just. He is not afraid of strong enemies. He often destroys evil spirits. Players incarnate as Nezha to eliminate all kinds of demons from the sky, land and water. Players can have the same magic power as Nezha. You can fly, you can dive, you can change into a bug...
